Lunar Transposition.name: Lunar Transposition
Lunar Transposition.fullText:
Moonrise Stalker Attack 11Lunar Transposition

This attack opens a passage through the Feywild, connecting you and your foe.

Encounter        Primal, Teleportation, Weapon
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Wisdom vs. AC

Hit: 1[W] + 1d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you can teleport up to 10 squares, swapping places with the target.

Special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.


Published in Dragon Magazine 413.
Lunar Transposition.flavor: This attack opens a passage through the Feywild, connecting you and your foe.
Lunar Transposition.onHit: 1[W] + 1d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you can teleport up to 10 squares, swapping places with the target.
Lunar Transposition.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Moonbeam Step.name: Moonbeam Step
Moonbeam Step.fullText:
Moonrise Stalker Utility 12Moonbeam Step

You step through a patch of moonlight into the Feywild, emerging elsewhere. The moonlight forms a clinging, protective nimbus around you.

Encounter        Aura, Primal, Teleportation
Move Action      Personal

Effect: You teleport up to 5 squares. In addition, you activate an aura 1 that lasts until the start of your next turn. Any enemy in the aura takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls.


Published in Dragon Magazine 413.
Moonbeam Step.flavor: You step through a patch of moonlight into the Feywild, emerging elsewhere. The moonlight forms a clinging, protective nimbus around you.
Moonbeam Step.effect: You teleport up to 5 squares. In addition, you activate an aura 1 that lasts until the start of your next turn. Any enemy in the aura takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls.

Distant Echo.name: Distant Echo
Distant Echo.fullText:
Moonrise Stalker Attack 20Distant Echo

Echoes of this attack can harm other enemies nearby, and their pain can create a threshold through which you can step.

Daily        Primal, Teleportation, Weapon
Standard Action      Ranged weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Wisdom vs. AC

Hit: 1[W] + 1d6 + Wisdom modifier damage. Up to three other creatures within 10 squares of the target take damage equal to half the damage dealt to the target.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: You can teleport to swap positions with one creature that takes damage from this attack. An enemy teleported by this effect is dazed until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 413.
Distant Echo.flavor: Echoes of this attack can harm other enemies nearby, and their pain can create a threshold through which you can step.
Distant Echo.onHit: 1[W] + 1d6 + Wisdom modifier damage. Up to three other creatures within 10 squares of the target take damage equal to half the damage dealt to the target.
Distant Echo.effect: You can teleport to swap positions with one creature that takes damage from this attack. An enemy teleported by this effect is dazed until the end of your next turn.
